org.kurento.repository

Interface RepositoryClient


  • public interface RepositoryClient
    Client API for the Kurento repository server application. It uses REST as means of communicating with the server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RepositoryItemRecorder createRepositoryItem(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
      Creates a new repository item with the provided metadata, ready for media recording.
      RepositoryItemPlayer getReadEndpoint(java.lang.String itemId)
      Obtains a new endpoint for reading (playing multimedia) from the repository item.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRepositoryItemMetadata(java.lang.String itemId)
      Returns the metadata from a repository item.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> regexFindItems(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchValues)
      Searches for repository items by each pair of attributes whose values can be regex Strings.
      Response removeRepositoryItem(java.lang.String itemId)
      Removes the repository item associated to the provided id.
      Response setRepositoryItemMetadata(java.lang.String itemId, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
      Replaces the metadata of a repository item.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> simpleFindItems(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchValues)
      Searches for repository items by each pair of attributes and their expected values.

    • Method Detail

      • createRepositoryItem

        RepositoryItemRecorder createRepositoryItem(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Creates a new repository item with the provided metadata, ready for media recording.
        Parameters:
        metadata - a map of values. Can be empty but not null.
        Returns:
        a RepositoryItemRecorder containing the item's id and an URL through which Kurento Media Server can record media sent by the client

      • removeRepositoryItem

        Response removeRepositoryItem(java.lang.String itemId)
        Removes the repository item associated to the provided id.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        Returns:
        a Response containing the response code from the server

      • getReadEndpoint

        RepositoryItemPlayer getReadEndpoint(java.lang.String itemId)
        Obtains a new endpoint for reading (playing multimedia) from the repository item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        Returns:
        a RepositoryItemPlayer containing the item's id and an URL from which Kurento Media Server can play (serve) stored media streams

      • simpleFindItems

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> simpleFindItems(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchValues)
        Searches for repository items by each pair of attributes and their expected values.
        Parameters:
        searchValues - pairs of attributes and their values
        Returns:
        a Set<String> with identifiers of the repository items that were found

      • regexFindItems

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> regexFindItems(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchValues)
        Searches for repository items by each pair of attributes whose values can be regex Strings.
        Parameters:
        searchValues - pairs of attributes and their values
        Returns:
        a Set<String> with identifiers of the repository items that were found

      • getRepositoryItemMetadata

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRepositoryItemMetadata(java.lang.String itemId)
        Returns the metadata from a repository item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        Returns:
        the metadata map

      • setRepositoryItemMetadata

        Response setRepositoryItemMetadata(java.lang.String itemId,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Replaces the metadata of a repository item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        metadata - the new metadata
        Returns:
        a Response with the response code from the server
